resources.string:
Info Text
This view shows you all missing Permissions.
Swipe left to see further Details.
Swipe right to grant the Permission.
Note:
Most of these Permissions are needed for the App to function.
Info Text\nThis view shows the available Communication Technologies.\nSwipe right to enable, or left to disable each Communication.

Info Text
This view shows all Sensors used in this App.
Swipe right to start a Diagnosis.
Swipe left to disable the Diagnosis again.
Network-Permissions\n\nUsed to connect to the Internet.
Storage-Permissions\n\nUsed to store Data and Settings.
Bluetooth-Permissions\n\nUsed to scan and connect to other Devices for Transmission.
NFC-Permissions\n\nUsed to interact with other Stakeholders.
